common.INFO_FORMAT: To downgrade to @: @, current ELO: @ (@), next rank @: @
common.PLAY_MORE: [red]You rating is yet unknown. You should play [yellow]@[red] more matches to calibrate
common.MUTE_USE_ID_FROM_LIST:
Now use id to specify the player:
@
common.MUTE_TOO_MANY_WITH_SUCH_ID: Too many players with such name, use id instead.
common.TOO_MANY_MUTES: You can't mute more than 50 players. Consider using [yellow]/muteall[white] instead.
common.AUTOREADY_ON: [yellow]AutoReady[white] is [green]ON[white]. Note: your queue status didn't change, send [yellow]/r
common.AUTOREADY_OFF: [yellow]AutoReady[white] is [red]OFF[white]. Note: your queue status didn't change, send [yellow]/r
common.RATING_LIMIT_CHANGED: Will be looking for opponents with rating @ - @
common.MUTED_UNTIL: [scarlet]Warning: you have been muted until @ for spam.
common.MUTED_EVERYONE: Note: you muted everyone. Send [yellow]/muteall[white] to unmute.
common.MESSAGE_LIMIT: [scarlet]You may only send @ messages within last @ seconds.
common.INTERACTION_TOO_QUICKLY: [scarlet]You are interacting with blocks too quickly. WTF are you doing?
common.ALREADY_HAS_TIMER: [red]Timer is already set in @ minutes @ seconds, send [yellow]/cleartimer[red] first
common.KICK_PLAYER_ID_ONLINE: [scarlet]You are already online from another device. If you think there is an error, please contact admins at @
common.DISCORD_LINK_SUCCESS: [green]Your account was successfully linked to user [yellow]@
common.DISCORD_LINK_INVALID_DISCORD_TOKEN: [red]Token was not found, get your token at [yellow]ranked.ddns.net
common.DISCORD_LINK_ALREADY_LINKED: [scarlet]Your account is already linked to user [green]@[], send [yellow]/unlinkdiscord[] to unlink
common.DISCORD_UNLINK_NO_LINKS: [scarlet]Your account is not linked, send [yellow]/linkdiscord[] first
common.DISCORD_ALREADY_HAS_LINK: [scarlet]This discord is already linked, use other account or unlink discord via website [yellow]ranked.ddns.net
common.INTERNAL_ERROR: [scarlet]Internal error, please contact admins on Discord @
common.CMD_DESCRIPTION_ar: toggle your AutoReady - if turned on, you are automatically queued in 15 seconds after entering the lobby
common.CMD_DESCRIPTION_limit: sets preferred rating of your opponent
common.CMD_DESCRIPTION_nolimit: removes rating check between you and your opponent
common.CMD_DESCRIPTION_mail: sends message to another player (works offline)
common.READ_EXAMPLE_USAGE:
[scarlet]Example usage:
[yellow]/read[] - shows next unread message
[yellow]/read all[] - shows recent messages
[yellow]/read all 4[] - shows recent messages, page 4
[yellow]/read clear - clears stored messages (limit 500)
common.UI_EXAMPLE_USAGE:
[scarlet]Example usage:
[yellow]/ui[] - shows current UI configuration
[yellow]/ui - timer[] - removes timer from matches
[yellow]/ui + queue_info[] - enables queue info
common.NO_UNREAD_MAIL: You have no unread mail, consider using [yellow]/read all
common.MAIL_EXAMPLE_USAGE:
[scarlet]Example usage:
[yellow]/m 0 This server is great!
/m 9999 Fix discord bot please!
common.YOU_ARE_MUTED_BY_PLAYER: [scarlet]This player has muted you, message is not sent.
common.UNREAD_MAIL: You have @ unread messages! Send [yellow]/read[] to read them!
common.MAIL_NEXT_PAGE: [green]This is page [yellow]@[], for other page type [yellow]/read all [page]
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_DAGGER_SPAMMER_I: produce 100 daggers in a single 1v1 match
produce 200 daggers in a single 1v1 match
produce 500 daggers in a single 1v1 match
produce 750 daggers in a single 1v1 match
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_DAGGER_SPAMMER_V: produce 1000 daggers in a single 1v1 match
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_ARC_SPAMMER_I: build 30 arcs in a single 1v1 match
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_ARC_SPAMMER_II: build 70 arcs in a single 1v1 match
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_ARC_SPAMMER_III: build 150 arcs in a single 1v1 match
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_ARC_SPAMMER_IV: build 250 arcs in a single 1v1 match
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_ARC_SPAMMER_V: build 500 arcs in a single 1v1 match
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_REVENGE_I: win against opponent you just lost
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_REVENGE_II: win against opponent you just lost 3 times in a row
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_REVENGE_III: win against opponent you just lost 5 times in a row
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_ROUTERIZE: build router adjacent to 4 other routers
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_I_GO_BIG_II: produce 10 t4 units in a single 1v1 match
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_I_GO_BIG_III: produce 10xt4 + 1xt5 unit in a single 1v1 match
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_MULTIPURPOSE_MAS: produce every unit in a single 1v1 match
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_KAMIKAZE: kill enemy's core with falling damage from your ship
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_LOGIC_GURU_I: build 50 micro processors in a single 1v1 match
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_LOGIC_GURU_II: build 20 logic processors in a single 1v1 match
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_LOGIC_GURU_III: build 5 hyper processors in a single 1v1 match
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_ROBOT: kill all cores using logic-controlled units
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_MAGNATE_I: collect 500 surge alloy at some point in time
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_MAGNATE_II: collect 2500 surge alloy at some point in time
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_MAGNATE_III: collect 8000 surge alloy at some point in time
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_GET_ATTENTION_I: have 3 people spectate your match at the same time
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_GET_ATTENTION_II: have 6 people spectate your match at the same time
have 10 people spectate your match at the same time
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_COMPLETE_DESTRUC: leave only your buildings on the map at the end of the match
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_FLAWLESS_VICTORY: win a match without a single unit/building loss
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_FASTER_THAN_LIGH: travel via pan view at least half of the map
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_KABOOM: control full squad of crawlers and blow them up at the same time
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_PEW_PEW: spend 5 minutes shooting in a single 1v1 match
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_COLLECTOR: put every resource into the core
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_SCREW_THAT: surrender in the first 30 seconds of the match
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_LONGPLAY: play the match for longer than 1 hour
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_LAST_CHANCE: make the last reconnection to the match
common.ACHIEVEMENT_NAME_WHO_LIVES_IN_A_PINAPPLE: Who Lives in a Pinapple Under The Sea?
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_WHO_LIVES_IN_A_P: drown 20 units in a single match
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_BASIC_MOVE: win the match using only t1 units
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_TIEKILLED: lose your core from tiebreaker damage
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_MULTIPURPOSE_NOV: make each t1 unit during the match
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_MULTIPURPOSE_AMA: make each t3 unit during the match
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_HANDMADE: win the match without building turrets
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_NO_TIME_WASTED: keep <30 seconds between any building for the whole match
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_TRAVELLER: move your unit 500 blocks on payload conveyor
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_THIN_ICE: completely repair core from less than 10 hp
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_COMEBACK: win having at least 4 cores less than your opponent
common.ACHIEVEMENT_DESCRIPTION_DAVID_AND_GOLIAT: win against opponent using less-tiered units

lobby.WELCOME_MESSAGE:
[red]Welcome!

[white]Important:
You will be queued automatically for 1v1 in [yellow]15[] seconds

send into chat
[yellow]/r[white] to queue or dequeue
[yellow]/ai[white] to match vs AI
[yellow]/help[white] to list all commands

Leave feedback in [blue]Discord[white]:
[yellow]@[white]
or in-game via [yellow]/mail 0 [your message]
lobby.NOT_IN_QUEUE_FORMAT:
[red]You are not in queue, send [yellow]/r
[red]or [yellow]/ai[red] to warmup vs AI[white]
lobby.OPPONENT_LEFT_QUEUE: [red]Your opponent left, looking for another one[white]
lobby.NOT_WAITING_FOR_MATCH: You are [red]NOT waiting[white] for a match.
lobby.IN_THE_QUEUE: You are in the queue now.
lobby.IN_THE_QUEUE_VS_AI: You are in the queue vs AI now.
lobby.AI_WRONG_LEVEL:
[scarlet]Wrong AI level: [yellow]@
[scarlet]Available levels: [yellow]easy, noob, normal, hard, extreme
lobby.AI_EXAMPLE_USAGE:
Example usages:
[yellow]/ai easy
/ai HARD[]
Available levels and their rating:
@Recommended: [yellow]/ai @[]
You can also select map: [yellow]/ai @ @
lobby.ABOUT_TO_BEGIN_FORMAT_AI:
[red]Match vs AI @ is ready!
Starting in @ seconds.
lobby.AUTOREADY_IS_ON: AutoReady is [green]ON.[white] You will be queued in @ seconds.
lobby.HARD_SHUTDOWN: Server is restarting due to maintenance. Try reconnecting in a couple minutes.
lobby.SLOW_CONNECTION_KICK: You have been away for too long. Please, reconnect to server.
lobby.SLOW_CONNECTION_WARN: [scarlet]WARNING: [red]Your connection seem to be slow. You have been removed from the queue.
lobby.SERVER_AUTHOR_INFO_LABEL:
[red]Mindustry Ranked PvP[white] server by SeaPy
Available commands: [yellow]/help

[yellow]Site: ranked.ddns.net
[#7289da]Discord : discord.gg/Hjr92J7
lobby.UNREAD_NEWS: You have [yellow]@[white] unread news, send [yellow]/news[white] to read them.
lobby.AUTOREADY_OFF_UNREAD_NEWS: Your AutoReady is [red]not[white] triggered because you have unread [cyan]@ [yellow]/news
lobby.NEW_JOIN_NUMBER:
[green]Your join key is [yellow]@[green], use it on secondary account with [yellow]/join @[green].

[red]Do not lose this key, write it down or make a screenshot.
Your history and rating on secondary account will NOT be transferred and will become inaccessible!
lobby.CANT_JOIN_LINKED_DISCORD: [green]Your account is linked with discord. Unlink it via [yellow]/unlinkdiscord[] or via website [yellow]ranked.ddns.net
lobby.INVALID_JOIN_KEY: [scarlet]Invalid key provided, get you key on main account via [yellow]/join
lobby.INVALID_JOIN_YOURSELF: [scarlet]You can't join yourself, use another account/device
lobby.MAP_BANS_NO_ROOMS: [scarlet]Can't get map list, please contact admins.
lobby.MAP_BANS_EXAMPLE_USAGE:
Example usages:
[yellow]/mapban + belshir_beach
/mapban - Ever Dream v3
/mapban
lobby.MAP_BANS_MAX_COUNT:
You can't ban more than [yellow]@[] maps. Remove via [yellow]/mapban - [mapname]
[]You banned: [yellow]@
lobby.MAP_BANS_ADDED: You added [yellow]@[] to maps bans. New list: [yellow]@
lobby.MAP_BANS_REMOVED: You removed [yellow]@[] from map bans. New list: [yellow]@
lobby.BUILD_RESTRICTION: [scarlet]You should complete [yellow]@[] more 1v1 matches before being able to build in lobby. Send [yellow]/r[] and wait for a match
lobby.BUILDING_BLOCKED: [scarlet]Building in lobby is temporarily blocked by admins

room.MATCH_NOT_STARTED: [scarlet]You can't surrender in paused or not started match.
room.JOINED_AS_SPECTATOR: You joined as spectator. Type [yellow]/hub[] to get back to hub, default chat is spectator-only, use [yellow]/t[] to send message to everyone.
room.PC_TAB_SWITCHES_THE_CHAT_MODE: Useful tip: <TAB> (left from Q) key switches the chat mode between normal and [yellow]/t[] command.
room.START_FORMAT:
[green]Map [yellow]@[white]
@[white] vs @[white]:
win @
lose @
draw @
W/L @/@

[yellow]/surrender[white] to surrender
room.START_FORMAT_AI:
[green]Map [yellow]@[white]
@[white] vs @[white]
Rating is not affected
W/L @/@

[yellow]/surrender[white] to surrender
room.RECONNECTS_LEFT: You have [red]@[] reconnects left! To surrender send [yellow]/surrender
room.PLAYER_RECONNECTED: Player @[white] ([#@]@[]) reconnected, he has [yellow]@[] reconnections left.
room.PLAYER_DISCONNECTED: Player @[white] ([#@]@[]) disconnected, he has [yellow]@[] reconnections left and can still come back.
room.OPPONENT_LEFT_WHILE_AWAY: Your opponent left while you were away. If he doesn't come back soon, you win!
room.OPPONENT_TAKES_TOO_LONG_TO_CONNECT: It seems like your opponent takes too long to connect, @ seconds left.
room.OPPONENT_LEFT: Your opponent left the match. Waiting @ seconds for reconnect, or you win! [red]Do not go away, or you may lose instead!
room.HARD_SHUTDOWN_ROOM: Room is restarting due to maintenance. Your rating was not changed.
